title: Exploring Rust Traits for Customized Methods
description: In this lab, we explore the concept of traits in Rust, which are a collection of methods defined for an unknown type called Self. Traits can be implemented for any data type, allowing the use of methods defined within the trait.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Traits Exploration
meta.description: Discover the power of Rust traits, a collection of methods defined for an unknown type. Dive into trait implementation and usage with this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: Rust, Traits, Programming, Software Development, Self, Methods
